inclusion.criterion: Males and females equal or greater than 40 years of age.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: HIV-1 RNA level below 200 copies/mL for at least 12 weeks prior to study entry
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: CD4 T Cells ≥200 cells/mm3 at screening
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Continuous ART for at least 12 weeks with no change in regimen prior to study entry.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who are investigational site staff members directly involved in the conduct of the trial and their family members, site staff members otherwise supervised by the Investigator, or subjects who are Regeneron employees.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Participation in other studies involving small molecule investigational drug(s).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of CAD and severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery, which may be a contraindication for the study. Additionally, the patient's LDL-C level is high (545 mg/dL), which may also be a contraindication.
